attributes.action: Cancel HS2 and spend the budget on recovering from Coronavirus.
attributes.additional_details: Because of the estimated amount of money HS2 is ‘expected’ to cost, the money should be better allocated to supporting small, medium and independent Companies. To enable them to re-energise and re-launch their businesses. The ‘estimated’ eye-watering budget/guess for HS2 cannot now be justified.
attributes.background: Considering the massive amount of money being promised to get through and eventually recover from the effects of the CoronaVirus, reallocate the money to getting the Country back to a fully functioning Nation.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302756

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
